pullrequest.title: Part 3: Better plugin registration and management

content.raw:
With the last few commits, we've reached very nearly 100% line coverage. I used `LCOV_EXCL_[START/STOP]` to ignore sanity check lines that we expect are impossible to reach, because testing for impossible lines doesn’t really make sense.

The only lines that aren't covered right now are related to a future feature which isn't fully implemented yet. I'd like to keep the partially-implemented feature in this PR, though, because it affects the footprint of the `ignition::plugin::Info` struct, so if we keep it partially implemented in this PR, then we can maintain API and ABI compatibility when the implementation is finished.
content.html:
With the last few commits, we've reached very nearly 100% line coverage. I used LCOV_EXCL_[START/STOP] to ignore sanity check lines that we expect are impossible to reach, because testing for impossible lines doesn’t really make sense.

The only lines that aren't covered right now are related to a future feature which isn't fully implemented yet. I'd like to keep the partially-implemented feature in this PR, though, because it affects the footprint of the ignition::plugin::Info struct, so if we keep it partially implemented in this PR, then we can maintain API and ABI compatibility when the implementation is finished.
